alert.note: Alert for Alexander; Pulaski; Union (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Union, northwestern Pulaski, north central Alexander and east central Cape Girardeau Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 629 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Ware, or near Trail Of Tears State Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Anna and Dongola. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 15 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
